original_title: Moi, Rodrigo: L’ange de la mort
overview: A former professional wrestler in Mexico, Rodrigo leads a peaceful retirement in France with his mute son Juanito, whom he has been raising alone since the death of his wife. One day, this sick man decides to renew links with Alice, the girl he neglected during his glorious past.
title: Moi, Rodrigo: L’ange de la mort
